name: (Re)slimed
description:
You are a little robot who is in charge of keeping the clock tower clean and in working order. But what's that? Evil slimes here to clog up the gears? Better pull out your wrench and get to work, those turrets aren't going to (re)wind themselves!

Made in 5 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
the theme was rewind

move - WASD / Arrow Keys

interact - Z / Right Mouse

attack - X / Left Mouse

(re)wind - C / Middle Mouse
